Package Math

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
Math.Transform
public class Transform extends Object
Transform class provides factory methods for the simple transformations - rotating, scaling, and translation. It allows to get the transformation matrix elements for any transform.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transform()
    Constructor that initializes the position and rotation to zeros and scales to one

  • Method Details

    • getProjectedTransformation

      public Matrix4x4 getProjectedTransformation()
      Get our transformation, and then it's going to pass it through whatever our projection is
      Returns:
      Whatever that edge translation is. (Transformation + Projection)

    • getTransformation

      public Matrix4x4 getTransformation()
      The function, which returns the transformation matrix of the transform. By multiplying the translation, rotation and scale matrix's
      Returns:
      The transformation matrix of the transform

    • setProjection

      public static void setProjection(float fov, float width, float height, float zNear, float zFar)
      Setter function, which sets the desired parameters to the camera
      Parameters:
      fov - - Field of view, some angle away from our face (camera)
      width - - Screen width
      height - - Screen height
      zNear - How near something can be from us (camera)
      zFar - - How near something can be from us (camera)
